txt.en: Signs of a struggle lay before the gate
Search for Captain Lachír and his men within the great forges of Anglach, in Udûn.
The unmistakable voices of Men echo from nearby - they must be close
Search for Captain Lachír and his men within the great forges of Anglach, in Udûn.
I have found it at last!
Search for Captain Lachír and his men within the great forges of Anglach, in Udûn.
You should talk to Captain Lachír now that you have found him in the lower levels of Anglach, in Udûn.
Search for Captain Lachír and his men within the great forges of Anglach, in Udûn.

'I have found it at last. Not, I confess, as I imagined it, a bright sword or luminous pendant. I sought high and low for those, in vain. But these ingots, why, they are heavy with power. They are hot to the touch! Think what a sword forged from this metal might be. With the Enemy's own works shall I bow and break his kingdom!'

'Stand back! Wait, you are no forge-goblin. You are one of the... Periain? A sign and a portent, truly!\n\n'I have found it at last. Not, I confess, as I imagined it, a bright sword or luminous pendant. I sought high and low for those, in vain. But these ingots, why, they are heavy with power. They are hot to the touch! Think what a sword forged from this metal might be. With the Enemy's own works shall I bow and break his kingdom!'

'Stand back! Wait, you are no forge-goblin. You are one of the... Periain? A sign and a portent, truly!\n\n'I have found it at last. Not, I confess, as I imagined it, a bright sword or luminous pendant. I sought high and low for those, in vain. But these ingots, why, they are heavy with power. They are hot to the touch! Think what a sword forged from this metal might be. With the Enemy's own works shall I bow and break his kingdom!'

'Can I believe my eyes? An Elf in these smoky depths? A sign and a portent, truly!\n\n'I have found it at last. Not, I confess, as I imagined it, a bright sword or luminous pendant. I sought high and low for those, in vain. But these ingots, why, they are heavy with power. They are hot to the touch! Think what a sword forged from this metal might be. With the Enemy's own works shall I bow and break his kingdom!'
Follow the voices of Men within the great forges of Anglach, in Udûn.

'Can I believe my eyes? An Elf in these smoky depths? A sign and a portent, truly!\n\n'I have found it at last. Not, I confess, as I imagined it, a bright sword or luminous pendant. I sought high and low for those, in vain. But these ingots, why, they are heavy with power. They are hot to the touch! Think what a sword forged from this metal might be. With the Enemy's own works shall I bow and break his kingdom!'
DNT
Approach Anglach
Search for Lachír in Anglach
What hope did Lachír see in this forbidden place?
You find only Lachír, his eyes gleaming with inspiration and a smile on his face
According to Coldan the look-out, Captain Lachír and his search party entered the great forge of Anglach and have not yet come out.
Choking smoke and a wash of heat fill the air here
Find Lachír
You should approach the great forges of Anglach in Udûn, and search for a way in.
Search for Lachír in Anglach

'Have you guessed it? It was into Anglach that Captain Lachír led the search party. He felt that for certain, that miraculous treasure he had become fixated on must lie within. I have watched for the better part of a day and still they have not returned. Does that mean they have found the treasure? I am unsure. I - I do not like lingering on the thought.\n\n'If you seek him, that is where you are bound, too. As for me, I will take your good council and make straight for the Foothold!'
Search for Lachír in Anglach
Search for Lachír in Anglach
There is no sign of the Captain here. They must be deeper in
The Dark Depths of Anglach
Talk to Captain Lachír
